INTRO.SUB-MESSAGE: We provide innovative educational applications for bilingual communities.

DESCRIPTION.PARAGRAPH: LangInnov is a start-up company whose mission is to support the development of bilingualism by addressing the need for adequate assessment materials for the growing bilingual population that enters U.S. educational systems.
Our first product, BLAST, is being developed with funds awarded by the National Science Foundation.

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Products
SERVICES.SUB-MESSAGE: Bilingual Literacy Assessment and Skills Tracker

DESCRIPTION.PARAGRAPH: BLAST is a user-friendly, fully automated, multi-platform, language and literacy assessment for emergent bilinguals, that allows them to respond in English, their home language, or both. It measures reading, writing, listening, speaking, and cognitive skills. The assessment is intuitive, adapting to each student on the go, based on their responses, and is graded automatically in real time.

FEATURE1.TITLE: Language and literacy assessment for bilinguals
FEATURE1.DESCRIPTION: It measures reading, writing, listening and oral skills. The assessment is intuitive, adapting to each student on the go, and is graded automatically.

FEATURE2.TITLE: A user-friendly and fully automated application
FEATURE2.DESCRIPTION: It includes a platform where teachers and parents collaborate and where each student receives a personalized bundle of analytics and activities.

FEATURE3.TITLE: Capable of assessing oral skills in children
FEATURE3.DESCRIPTION: This is accomplished by using a speech recognizer that will be refined by integrating machine learning algorithms trained on children speech data.

ABOUT.TITLE: ABOUT US
ABOUT.MESSAGE: LangInnov was founded by two entrepreneurial women: Dr. Rocio Raña and Dr. Xuan-Nga Cao.
ABOUT.SUB-MESSAGE: Dr. Raña and Dr. Cao met in New York City while pursuing doctoral studies in linguistics. Since then, they have collaborated in research, educational, and business projects. LangInnov is the culmination of years of joint and independent work that allowed them to realize that there was a societal need for an app such as BLAST.

DESCRIPTION.PARAGRAPH: During their first years of life, infants develop physically, emotionally and cognitively at an amazing speed.

These early acquisitions lay the foundation for later academic, personal and professional achievements. With BabyCloud you can learn more about about your child's progress during these fascinating days.

BabyCloud documents and tracks your child’s natural language development. The low profile BabyLogger captures their everyday interactions which are then analysed by state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms. The findings are delivered directly to your phone with the BabyCloud application.
We have designed BabyCloud to give you complete control over your data. All data is encrypted and only you have access to the audio files.
When contributing to research, you can choose to contribute your data in full, in part, or not at all. All data that is contributed is anonymized and transferred via a secure protocol.
Parents, you have the opportunity to take part in our scientific research to establish pioneering quantitative standards and predictive models!

Your contribution helps BabyCloud develop tools for early diagnosis of speech delays as well as more efficient intervention programs. These programs will help many children impacted by language or cognitive disorders worldwide.

STEPS.NAME: Start with the Logger
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Capture your family’s interactions throughout the day and to document the input your child is receiving during their language acquisition stage.

STEPS.NAME: Recharge with the Dock
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: While the logger charges, the dock transfers the recordings to the secure cloud for analysis. Don’t worry, the process is totally secure and encrypted.

STEPS.NAME: Analyze with the Baby SmartBox
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Our existing pipeline (source separation, voice activity detection, speaker diarization) will extract, segment and label stretches of data with communicative activity.

STEPS.NAME: Get informed with the Explorer
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Parents have access to metadata and developmental analytics (child’s first words, language milestones, linguistic and social interactions clips and analyses).

STEPS.NAME: Get involved in “Citizen Science”
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Ultimately, your contribution will help many children impacted by language or cognitive disorders worldwide.
